alert.note: Alert for Eastern Aleutians (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Watch issued January 01 at 3:21AM AKST until January 02 at 9:00PM AKST by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING THROUGH TUESDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Southeast winds 35 to 55 mph with gusts up to 75 mph possible. * WHERE...Eastern Aleutians. * WHEN...This evening through Tuesday evening. * IMPACTS...High winds could move loose debris, damage property, and cause power outages. Travel could be difficult. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Winds will start from the east-southeast this evening and turn more southerly to southwesterly during the day Tuesday. Strongest winds are expected to be late tonight into Tuesday morning, especially for Dutch Harbor and Unalaska.
info.instruction: A high wind watch means there is potential for a hazardous high wind event. Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates on this situation. Fasten loose objects or shelter objects in a safe location prior to the onset of winds.
